welcome_message_body: Welcome to Casablanca, a city known for its blend of old-world charm and modern sophistication. Get ready to immerse yourself in its vibrant culture, delicious cuisine, and captivating history. Enjoy your time exploring all that Casablanca has to offer!

restaurants.name: Santo Valle
